message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is my best offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Given your valuation of the product, I propose to sell it to you for $11,000. This is my final offer.
